Content:
@wookie `  "error": "couldnt finalize CCtx"` means that bailout tx was mined alredy
I wonder you ran into this inventory focus issue which will be resolved soon I hope

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: There was a bug with large inventory displaying (it not showed second page of inventory for a big one and it was a reason of focus losing) - so now when you check huge inventory it'll scroll page to second by Space button press and close it automatically in 5 seconds. Key pressed made during these 5 seconds not affecting gameplay
